flavorText:
"You wish for me to cow your enemies? I can do better than that . . . ."
—Teferi, second-level student

foreignData.flavorText: „Ihr wollt, dass ich Eure Feinde in Kühe verwandele? Da habe ich eine bessere Idee..." —Teferi, Lehrling des zweiten Grads
foreignData.name: Verhammelung
foreignData.text: Bis zum Ende des Zuges verliert eine Kreatur deiner Wahl alle Fähigkeiten und wird 0/1.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Quieres que atemorice a tus enemigos? Puedo hacer más que eso . . ." —Teferi, estudiante de segundo nivel
foreignData.name: Ovinizar
foreignData.text: La criatura objetivo pierde todas sus habilidades y es 0/1 hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « Vous voulez qu'ils deviennent doux comme des agneaux ? Je peux faire encore mieux . . . . » —Téfeiri, étudiant de deuxième niveau
foreignData.name: Ovinisation
foreignData.text: La créature ciblée perd toutes ses capacités et devient 0/1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: "Vuoi che mandi in vacca i tuoi nemici? Posso fare di meglio . . . ." —Teferi, studente di secondo livello
foreignData.name: Ovinizzare
foreignData.text: Una creatura bersaglio perde tutte le abilità e diventa 0/1 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 君の敵を脅かして欲しいって？ それより、もっといい方法があるよ … … 。 ――テフェリー、第二級生徒時代

foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それはすべての能力を失うとともに０/１になる。

foreignData.flavorText: "Quer que eu intimide seus inimigos? Posso fazer melhor que isso. . . ." — Teferi, estudante de segundo nível
foreignData.name: Ovinizar
foreignData.text: A criatura alvo perde todas as habilidades e torna-se 0/1 até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Ты хочешь, чтобы я испугал твоих врагов? Я могу сделать лучше . . . ». — Тефери, ученик второго уровня
foreignData.name: Овцевание
foreignData.text: Целевое существо теряет все способности и становится 0/1 до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 「你希望我替你吓吓敌人？ 我有更棒的主意. . . .」 ～泰菲力，第二级学生
foreignData.name: 羊化术
foreignData.text: 直到回合结束，目标生物失去所有异能，并成为0/1生物。

name: Ovinize
originalText: Target creature loses all abilities and becomes 0/1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Ovinize doesn’t counter abilities that have already triggered or been activated. In particular, you can’t cast this fast enough to stop a creature’s “At the beginning of your upkeep” or “When this creature enters the battlefield” abilities from triggering, since they trigger before players get priority.
If the affected creature gains an ability after Ovinize resolves, it will keep that ability.

If a face-down creature is affected by Ovinize, it won’t be able to be turned face up for its morph cost. If some other effect turns it face up, it will remain a 0/1 creature with no abilities until the turn ends. Its “When this creature turns face up” or “As this creature turns face up” abilities won’t work.

Ovinize can be used to disable a creature’s vanishing ability permanently by casting it in response to the vanishing upkeep trigger when there’s one time counter left. The last time counter will be removed as that ability resolves, but since the creature no longer has vanishing, the “sacrifice” triggered ability won’t exist. When Ovinize’s effect ends and the creature regains vanishing, its triggered ability will no longer be able to trigger because it has no time counters.

If Ovinize affects Mistform Ultimus, the Ultimus will lose its ability that says “Mistform Ultimus is every creature type,” but it will still *be* all creature types. The way continuous effects work, Mistform Ultimus’s type-changing ability is applied before Ovinize’s ability removes it.
Removes all creature abilities. This includes mana abilities. Animated lands will also lose the ability to tap for mana.

text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1.
